page.title: 10HOMELIFE
page.content: Of the many varied dishes to be found on the table of the local population probably the most popular is the{"supper".}It comes in many forms, namely the fish supper, pie supper, haggis supper, red pudding supper, white pudding supper and black pudding supper. These can be bought only in special shops called{"chippies"}which have become increasingly popular. This dish is at its tastiest when eaten "in the paper" with plenty of salt and vinegar. A pickle can be bought to accompany the "supper" and enhance its flavour. A survey taken showed that the fish supper is the most popular of the above dishes followed closely by the haggis supper.
